title: Equipment Item
description: An object that can be equipped by a character

id.description: Required. Unique identifier for the equipment item.

itemSlot.description: Required. Defines which location on the character that the item can be equipped.

enabledAbilityIds.description: List of combat ability IDs that are granted to the character when this item is equipped.

enabledStatusEffectIds.description: List of status effect IDs that are applied to the character while this item is equipped.
